shareAnalytics_detail: We collect anonymized data about how you use Celo to help improve the application for everyone.
dataSaverDetail: Data Saver mode allows you to communicate with the Celo Network through a trusted node. You can always change this mode in app settings.

restartModalSwitchOff.header: Restart To Switch Off Data Saver
restartModalSwitchOff.body: To switch Data Saver on and off repeatedly, you will need to restart the app.

restartModalSwitchOn.body: In case of incorrect PIN, you will need to restart the app.

promptFornoModal.body: We’ve noticed you’re having some trouble connecting. We recommend enabling Data Saver mode to allow you to keep using the Celo Wallet with intermittent connection.
